channel.title: dividend growth on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in dividend growth on FinanClub

item.title: NEE
item.description: score:-8 Chances: Bullish views on NextEra Energy as a smart bet on green energy and rising payout. Strong performance in renewable energy sector and positive outlook. Better value option compared to competitors. Dividend growth and strong track record of raising payouts. Positive market response to insider activity and strong earnings results.

item.title: WMT
item.description: score:-117 Chances: Walmart Inc. (WMT) is a well-established retail giant with a long track record of performance. The company’s brand is synonymous with quality products and services. Walmart’s willingness to pay increasing dividends to shareholders indicates a commitment to rewarding investors. The company’s dominance in the retail sector, especially in groceries, is seen as ‘unstoppable’ and offers growth potential.
